description.value:
You melt one of your thralls within 30 feet, destroying it and creating a wave of sticky, liquid flesh that floods out in a 60-foot cone. The area becomes greater difficult terrain. When you cast flesh tsunami, you can liquefy a second thrall, which must be in the cone's area, to make its limbs grasp your foes. If you do, each enemy in the area must attempt a Fortitude saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Failure The target takes a –20-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round or until it Escapes.
